name: Fabled Kingdom
description:
Fabled Kingdom is an example of the classic top-down adventure game. You have discovered the long sought ruins of a ancient kingdom. These crumbling buildings each have a story to tell, a strange artifact to bestow, and a powerful guardian to defeat.
Unlock and combine the effects of various items to carve out a playstyle unique to yourself. Explore the world at your leisure with variety and choices on which level to clear next.
Can you uncover the mysteries of the Fabled Kingdom?

Discover and map out the world in this top-down 2.5D adventure. In an abandoned kingdom travel from its deepest tunnels to the highest peak. As well as the dark labs, mines, refineries, train yards, storehouses, and castle that reside between.
Each of these Dungeons have required abilities to be entered. However, the player is not set on a linear path of exploration.

Explore 17 Dungeons at your choice, each of various size and difficulty.
Dungeons hold special abilities to collect:
An Oversized Mechanical Fist
A Summonable Block
A Spell of Firebolt
A Full Body Sphere Shield
A Fiery Dash
A Spell of Ward Against Death
A Spell of Healing
A Bouncy Explosive
Another Oversized Fist to Create a Pair
A Spell of Roots to Stop Enemies in Their Tracks
A Spell to Teleport a Short Distance
A Spell of Pure Energy
A Fireproof Suit
A Spell to Freeze Enemies in a Cube of Ice
A Spell to Stop Time
A Suit to Halve Damage
A Spell of Destruction

Combine the effects up to 4 of these abilities for unique items.
Create a bouncy grenade, launch it with an oversized fist, then detonate it with a firebolt!
Start a fiery charge, then activate the sphere shield to keep your momentum to extend your dash, all while being completely protected!
Summon a stone block, or freeze an enemy in ice to create cover, or launch them at enemies with the fist for a ranged attack.
Stop time and cast firebolts, root shots, and place explosives for massive damage the instant time resumes.

Use these abilities on powerful bosses, such as;
A Strong Bipedal Robot
A Massive Slime Giant
A Tank with Lasers
A Grand Mechanical Snake
An Old Scientist Who Summons His Failed Experiments
A Being with Abilities Similar to that of the Player
